name: Friends: Food!
description:
Arriving in your new neighborhood due to your dad's job, an unexpected event occurs practically overnight, and you're thrown right in the middle of it.

Recruited by a friendly neighborhood kid, you venture into your new shopping district, Grizzly Heights, only to find it completely overrun by things that shoulda been on your dinner plate! Hotdogs to donuts, hamburgers to ice cream, it's all here, and it's ready to attack you and your friends!

How many people can you recruit to your side, and how many can you depend on in the heat of battle? And how did everything happen in the first place?? and what the hell are the Legendary Fruits?!

Created in RPG Maker MV using a ton of plugins from the very talented community, Friends: Food! was AwesomeMonkey's big project that's been worked on constantly since August 2020. We hope you enjoy it as much as we enjoyed creating it!

Big thank you to everyone that helped us finish it and a special thanks to BryBryTheOrange for all the artwork that looks amazing, the cover art which is awesome, and the uber kewl soundtrack for Friends: Food!

Currently for Windows only, Mac version in very close future!
